name: Greedy Honeypot in Rock
description:
A tiny little arcade telling a story about one Greedy Honeypot who loves honey and Rock'n'Roll. And is deadly scared of bees...

Highlights:

* I am 41 and a father of three, a successful Executive in IT industry and this is the first ever completed game I actually started and finished. Thank you @Blackthornprod!

* Original soundtrack - my second (first) hobby is music so I went on and composed a little rock'n'roll theme and recorded some audio effects together with my 6 yo son (you can hear different "voices" if you listen carefully)))

* addicting gameplay - those 30-90 seconds you play will be full of action and running from a chase of ever-growing bee army!

* in full transparency: I used art I googled as a basis for almost all visual assets. Tweaked and changed for the purpose though. But I still treat the whole exercise as accomplishment. 

* Game was made for Blackthornprod Game Jam 2021 which had a theme "Less is more". In the game - the more honey you collect the less freedom you actually have.

Hope you enjoy the game. I am looking forward for your feedback. 

Thanks,

Andrey "Createev"
